00010 function __autoload($className) {
00011         // If DAO class, remove the ending 'DAO'
00012         $classFile = substr($className,-3)=='DAO' ? substr($className,0,-3) : $className;
00013         // This now works from everywhere
00014         //$classFilePath = $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'];
00015         $classFilePath = DOC_ROOT;
00016         //echo "cfp = $classFilePath";
00017         $classFileLongName = 'models/'.$classFile.'.php';
00018         //echo "cft = ".$classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName;
00019         if (file_exists($classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName))
00020                 require_once $classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName;
00021         else
00022                 throw new Exception("The class named $className does not exist !");
00023 }

00025 abstract class ModelDAO
00026 {
00027         // common to all ModelDAO instances :
00028 
00029         static protected $db = NULL; // Singleton database connection

00031         static protected $dbOldObs = NULL; //Singelton dbOldObs connection

00047         protected function __construct()
00048         {
00049                 $this->_modelName = $this->getModelName(); // ex : 'ModelDAO' --> 'Model'
00052                 if (self::$db == NULL)
00053                         self::$db = new DbConnector('');
00054 
00055                 /*if ((self::$dbTemp == NULL) && DbConnector::checkDb('Temp'))
00056                         self::$dbTemp = new DbConnector('Temp');*/
00057 
00058                 if ((self::$dbOldObs == NULL) && DbConnector::checkDb('OldObs'))
00059                         self::$dbOldObs = new DbConnector('OldObs');
00060 
00061                 if ((self::$dbOldSpa == NULL) && DbConnector::checkDb('OldSpa'))
00062                         self::$dbOldSpa = new DbConnector('OldSpa');
00063 
00064                 self::set($this);
00065 
00066         }

00091         {
00092                 $temp = self::$db;
00093                 self::$db = self::$dbTemp;
00094                 self::$dbTemp = $temp;
00095         }

00105         static public function getFromName($daoName) {
00106                 if (strtoupper(substr($daoName, -3)) != 'DAO') $daoName.='DAO';
00107                 if (!isset(self::$_daos[$daoName])) {
00108                         // create a new ModelDAO instance (will be UNIQUE and used by all other Models)
00109 //                      echo "NEW ";
00110 //                      echo "class = $daoName <br>";
00111                         self::set(new $daoName()); // ATTENTION: not allowed if ModelDAO constructor is private
00112                 }
00113                 return self::$_daos[$daoName];
00114         }

00130         function getModelName() { // ex : for GroupDAO --> model is "Group"
00131                 return substr(get_class($this), 0,-3);
00132         }

00137         public function get_field($field)
00138         {
00139                 if(array_key_exists($field, $this->_fields))
00140                         return htmlentities($this->_fields[$field],ENT_QUOTES);
00141                 else
00142                         return NULL;
00143         }
00144 
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147         public function get_has_many($x_field, $y_field=NULL)
00148         {
00149                 if($y_field == NULL)
00150                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field];
00151                 else if(isset($this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field]))
00152                         return $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field];
00153                 else
00154                         return NULL;
00155         }
00156 
00157 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00159         public function init_has_many($x_field, $y_field=NULL)
00160         {
00161                 if($y_field == NULL)
00162                 {
00163                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field] = array();
00164                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field], 0);
00165                 }
00166                 else
00167                 {
00168                         $this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field] = array();
00169                         array_push($this->_hasMany[$x_field][$y_field], 0);
00170                 }
00171 
00172                 //echo "INIT HAS MANY: " . $x_field . "<br>";
00173         }
